traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The demon’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The demon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Flame Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The demon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
